description:
A decade has passed since the war between humans and vampires, when the infectious bite of the Kowloon Bloodline set the streets ablaze. Today, Jiro travels to the Special Zone, where the peace between vampires and humans is threatening to crack. As a new battle erupts between human soldiers, vampiric refugees, and Kowloon Children, Jiro must draw the Silver Blade once more.

(Source: Funimation)
synonyms: ブラック・ブラッド・ブラザーズ

tags.name: Vampire

tags.name: Reincarnation
tags.description: Features a character being born again after death, typically as another person or in another world.

tags.name: Travel
tags.description: Centers around character(s) moving between places a significant distance apart.

tags.name: Revenge
tags.description: Prominently features a character who aims to exact punishment in a resentful or vindictive manner.

tags.name: War
tags.description: Partly or completely set during wartime.

tags.name: Terrorism
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a terrorist or terrorist organization.

tags.name: Historical
tags.description: Partly or completely set during a real period of world history.

__Cousin:__ [Aaron Dismuke](https://anilist.co/staff/95254/Aaron-Dismuke)

__Justin Ryan Cook__ is an American voice actor, producer, line producer, ADR director and enginner who works for FUNimation.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/brinapalencia) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/brinakins/) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/brina.palencia.7)

Brina Michelle Palencia is an American voice actress who has voiced a number of English-language versions of characters featured in anime. She's a graduate of University of North Texas. [Gino Palencia](https://anilist.co/staff/104093), her brother, also works for Funimation.

(Source: Wikipedia)
Light novel illustrator.

The founder and former representative director of [Funimation](https://anilist.co/studio/102/).

**Non-anime roles:**
- Policeman in "Chuck E. Cheese in the Galaxy 5000"

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/ToshiSahashi)

__Toshihiko Sahashi__ is a Japanese composer and arranger. He graduated from Tokyo National University of Fine Arts and Music in 1986. Sahashi has composed music for various anime series (including OVAs, films, and drama CDs), video games, films, dramas, and musicals.

The style of his composition is richly symphonic and classical (occasionally jazz). The use of sophisticated compositional techniques, as well as complicated harmony writing such as fugue can often be heard in his work, demonstrating his solid training in the western classical music. He also uses keyboard instruments to deliver more sentimental soundtracks to good effect.
[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/亀山俊樹)
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/nabe_atsu_live)
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/k_aza)

[Wiki (JP)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/芦田豊雄)

Toyoo Ashida was an anime character designer, animation director and director. He is the founder of the anime production studio Studio Live and as well as the Japanese Animation Creators Association (JAniCA) along with [Satoshi Kon](https://anilist.co/staff/99580/).

He is also known under the pseudonyms Yutaka Ekoda (江古田豊) and Monta Ibu (伊武紋太).

[Wiki (JP)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/芦田豊雄)

He is also known under the pseudonyms Yutaka Ekoda (江古田豊) and Monta Ibu (伊武紋太).
